text: 5. Write down a formula for the seventh and eighth even perfect numbers.You may use the result that the first six Mersenne primes correspond to the primes p = 2,3, 5,7, 13, 17, and 2'° — 1 is prime, 223 — 1 and 22° — 1 are composite, but 231 — 1 is prime.
